sourcesContent: import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Col, Row} from 'antd' import {Description} from '../atoms' import {useTranslation} from 'react-i18next' import {Text} from '../../../UIComponents/Typography/Text' import {SkeletonUI} from '../../../UIComponents/GlobalStyles' import {truncateString} from '../../../utils/stringUtils' import {useOfferingDetail} from '../../../Hooks/offerings' export const OfferingDescription = () => { const {t} = useTranslation() const {res, isLoading} = useOfferingDetail() const [truncate, setTruncate] = useState(false) console.log(res?.data) return ( {`${t('description')}:`} { !isLoading ? ( { res?.data?.description.length > 150 ? !truncate ? {truncateString(res?.data?.description, 150)} setTruncate(true)}>{t('more')} : {res?.data?.description} setTruncate(false)}>{t('hide')} : {res?.data?.description} } ) : ( <> ) } ) }
